long_desc: Slumped in a corner you see Ergan, aka the Murderer of Townsbridge.
flags_raw: You remember a time almost a decade ago, when the news of the day
stats1_raw: was how this man had slaughtered the entire population of the little
stats2_raw: village of Townsbridge.  He was imprisoned, and here he is - a shadow
stats3_raw: of the undoubtedly great warrior he once was, but still to be reckoned
